add	1	10000***

adc	1	10001***

ana	1	10100***

cma	1	00101111

cmc	1	00111111

cmp	1	10111***

daa	1	00100111

dad	1	00**1001

dcr	1	00***101

dcx	1	00**1011

di	1	11110011

ei	1	11111011

hlt	1	01110110

inr	1	00***100

inx	1	00**0011

ldax	1	000*1010

mov	1	01******

nop	1	00000000

ora	1	10110***

pchl	1	11101001

pop	1	11**0001

push	1	11**0101

ral	1	00010111

rar	1	00011111

rlc	1	00000111

rrc	1	00001111

ret	1	11001001

rc	1	11011000

rnc	1	11010000

rp	1	11110000

rm	1	11111000

rpe	1	11101000

rpo	1	11100000

rz	1	11001000

rnz	1	11000000

rim	1	00100000

rst	1	11***111

sbb	1	10011***

sim	1	00110000

sphl	1	11111001

stax	1	00**0010

stc	1	00110111

sub	1	10010***

xchg	1	11101011

xra	1	10101***

xthl	1	11100011

adi	2	11000110

ani	2	11100110

cpi	2	11111110

in	2	11011011

mvi	2	00***110

ori	2	11110110

out	2	11010011

sbi	2	11011110

xri	2	11101110

sui	2	11010110

call	3	11001101

cc	3	11011100

cnc	3	11010100

cp	3	11110100

cm	3	11111100

cpe	3	11101100

cpo	3	11100100

cz	3	11001100

cnz	3	11000100

jmp	3	11000011

jc	3	11011010

jnc	3	11010010

jp	3	11110010

jm	3	11111010

jpe	3	11011010

jpo	3	11010010

jz	3	11001010

jnz	3	11000010

lda	3	00111010

lhld	3	00101010

lxi	3	00**0001

shld	3	00100010

sta	3	00110010
